channel.title: Preparing for Bootware™ :: Zymbit Workshop
channel.description: Finally, making it secure Now that we have a proper security device installed, tested, and ready let’s secure this thing. At the very same time, let’s make sure that we can securely update the device when the time comes, and that it is built to be recoverable in case an update fails. Ordinarily this would be a ton of work, but we’re going to simplify everything and do it pretty much all at once.
